text_block_list.text:
The year has finally arrived—
Stay Gold's senior year—

...It's rare for Stay Gold to invite me, saying,
'Want to go for the first shrine visit of the year?'
So I went out with her during the night, but—
choice_data_list: (We've come quite far again, huh...)

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Haa...
The air is clear, feels nice...
choice_data_list: So, what kind of place are we going to today?
So, what kind of place are we going to today?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: I'm not really sure either.
choice_data_list: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Somewhere deep in these mountains,
there's supposedly a legendary shrine.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Wouldn't it be fun if we could visit it?
choice_data_list: Well, that's true, but—

text_block_list.text:
It does feel like there's too little information.
Looks like from the start of the year,
we're in for a bit of an adventure...!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
What's the big deal? If we don't find it,
we can just say we visited a beautiful sunrise.
Let's go check it out for now.

And so, as we entered the mountain path,
and the sun began to rise a bit—

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm. The fog is really thick.
choice_data_list: My phone's out of service too. I can't tell where we are...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's aim for a place with a good view.
That way, we might figure something out.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Since the fog is thick, don't wander off.
If we get separated, that would be bad.
choice_data_list: Got it...!

text_block_list.text:
And so, with Stay Gold,
we carefully advanced through the foggy forest—

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Alright, the fog is clearing up—

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: This place is...—

We came out into an open area... but it's strangely quiet.
And for some reason, I feel like straightening my back.
choice_data_list: Is this the legendary shrine...?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
........No. It seems different.
This feeling is—
————Normally, this place is off-limits.

text_block_list.name: Elderly Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text:
However, occasionally, people like you
are drawn here by fate and appear...

text_block_list.name: Elderly Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: ...I suppose I should say, welcome.
...I wonder how long she's been there? An elderly Umamusume in a kimono was standing there. Her dignified presence makes me strangely tense...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: My apologies. I didn't know this was a restricted area. ...Should I leave right away?

text_block_list.name: Elderly Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: No, that won't be necessary. This must be fate of some kind. It would be good to offer a prayer.
choice_data_list: Um... what should I pray for?

text_block_list.name: Elderly Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: For example, about the journey ahead.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer. Let's take her up on her offer and say a prayer, shall we?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: You don't get to experience a first shrine visit like this very often.
choice_data_list: That's... probably true, but—

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Now, what should I pray for...—
...Following Stay Gold's lead, I calmly try praying about my own journey ahead as well. What comes to mind first is—
choice_data_list: A strong body that never stops moving forward
The strength and skill to overcome hardships
A mindset to enjoy everything

text_block_list.text: ...So that I can continue traveling this path without interruption.
I prayed fervently that Stay Gold's body would remain healthy and strong.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Haha. That's quite a thorough prayer.
choice_data_list: Stego, what did you pray for?
Stego, what did you pray for?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: It's a secret.
...So that no matter what hardships lie ahead, she can overcome them.
I wished for Stay Gold to grow stronger and for myself to be able to help her grow.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Haha. That's quite a thorough prayer.
choice_data_list: Stego, what did you pray for?
Stego, what did you pray for?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: It's a secret.
...So that no matter what happens, Stay Gold can enjoy it.
I prayed that her golden mindset would never change and that I could remain that way too.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Haha. That's quite a thorough prayer.
choice_data_list: Stego, what did you pray for?
Stego, what did you pray for?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: It's a secret.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: ...Umamusume, you there. May I ask your name?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Stay Gold.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: Stay Gold-san. ...It seems you are connected to many fates.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: And now, those fates have formed a great vortex, turning into chaos.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: ――――To the point of disrupting the order of the world.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: ...Out of an old woman's concern, let me ask you this.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: Do you intend to continue on like this?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah. I plan to go on enjoying it.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: ...If you wish to return, walk straight in that direction. You should be able to descend to the foot of the mountain.
choice_data_list: Th-thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Elder Umamusume in Kimono
text_block_list.text: May you have a good journey. May fortune be with the fates that revolve――
The next moment, a fierce wind blew so strong I couldn't keep my eyes open...!
I covered my face with my arms to endure the wind, and when I felt it subside and opened my eyes――

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...She's gone.
choice_data_list: She disappeared...!?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Well, that's common in the mountains. Better not think too deeply about it.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's head back as she said. Making too much noise wouldn't be good for this place.
choice_data_list: ...Y-yeah.
...Y-yeah.

text_block_list.text: After that, we entered the foggy forest again and walked straight in the direction the elder Umamusume indicated――
――How long did we walk? Before I knew it, we had passed through the forest and descended to the foot of the mountain...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Phew, we made it back, we made it back.
choice_data_list: What in the world was that place...?

text_block_list.text: And also, who was that elder Umamusume――

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Who knows. Well, but I'm sure it was worth praying there.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: For today, that should be fine, right? We got to have an interesting experience too.
choice_data_list: Well... I guess that's true
Well... I guess that's true

text_block_list.text: ...Since meeting Stay Gold, I secretly realize there's a part of me that quickly adapts to strange things.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Ah~, but I'm hungry~. Let's eat something nearby.
choice_data_list: I wonder if there's a place to eat around here...

text_block_list.text: ...In the end, after that, we ended up wandering around with Stay Gold for a while longer, looking for a place to eat——
